stanza.stanza: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena māmupayānti te
paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān
asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me
na hi te bhagavanvyaktiṃ vidurdevā na dānavāḥ

word_info.hindi: सकते हैं (अर्थात् किन-किन भावोंमें मैं आपका चिन्तन करूँ?)

stanza.stanza: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo'si bhagavanmayā
bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptirhi śṛṇvato nāsti me'mṛtam
na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
ahamādiśca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānāmanta eva ca

word_info.english: seated in the hearts of all beings

stanza.stanza: purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim

word_info.english: among the Siddhas or the perfected
kamadhenu,  the heavenly cow which yiedls all desires

word_info.hindi: जानता है अर्थात्  दृढ़तासे (सन्देहरहित) स्वीकार कर लेता है,

word_info.english: the great Lord of the worlds
the Allfaced (or having faces in all directions)

stanza.stanza: kīrtiḥ śrīrvākca nārīṇāṃ smṛtirmedhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā

word_info.english: of those who are to be prosperous

stanza.stanza: na tadasti vinā yatsyānmayā bhūtaṃ carācaram

word_info.hindi: हो अर्थात् चर-अचर सब कुछ मैं ही हूँ।

stanza.stanza: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayameva ca

word_info.english: a manifestation of a part of

word_info.hindi: स्थित हूँ अर्थात् अनन्त ब्रह्माण्ड मेरे किसी एक अंशमें है।

stanza.stanza: bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ
madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ

word_info.hindi: जानता है अर्थात् दृढ़तापूर्वक (सन्देह-रहित) स्वीकार कर लेता है,

stanza.stanza: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ
ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate
iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ

word_info.hindi: प्रवृत्त हो रहा है अर्थात् चेष्टा कर रहा है—
भजन करते हैं—सब प्रकारसे मेरे ही शरण होते हैं।

stanza.stanza: kathayantaśca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca

word_info.english: with their minds wholly in Me
with their life absorbed in Me

word_info.hindi: मुझ पर कृपा करने के लिए
word_info.english: for the sake of blessing me

word_info.hindi: जिनके अनेक मुख और नेत्र हैं,
हाथोंमें उठाये हुए अनेक दिव्य आयुध हैं
(तथा) जिनके गलेमें दिव्य मालाएँ हैं, जो अलौकिक वस्त्र पहने हुए हैं,
जिनके ललाट तथा शरीरपर दिव्य चन्दन, कुंकुम आदि लगा हुआ है,

stanza.stanza: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syādbhāsastasya mahātmanaḥ

word_info.hindi: आश्चर्यके कारण उनका शरीर रोमांचित हो गया।

stanza.stanza: paśyāmi devāṃstava deva dehe sarvāṃstathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṅghān

word_info.english: hosts of various classes of beings
with manifold arms,  stomachs,  mouths and eyes
word_info.hindi: अनेक हाथों, पेटों, मुखों और नेत्रोंवाला (तथा)

stanza.stanza: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punastavādiṃ paśyāmi viśveśvara  viśvarūpa

word_info.hindi: चक्र (तथा शंख और पद्म)धारण किये हुए
देदीप्यमान अग्नि तथा सूर्यके समान कान्तिवाले,
word_info.english: blazing like burning fire and sun

stanza.stanza: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca tejorāśiṃ sarvato dīptimantam
tvamakṣaraṃ paramaṃ veditavyaṃ tvamasya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam
tvamavyayaḥ śāśvatadharmagoptā sanātanastvaṃ puruṣo mato me
paśyāmi tvāṃ dīptahutāśavaktraṃ svatejasā viśvamidaṃ tapantam

word_info.english: Thy eyes as the sun and the moon
Thy mouth as the burning fire

stanza.stanza: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā
dyāvāpṛthivyoridamantaraṃ hi vyāptaṃ tvayaikena diśaśca sarvāḥ
dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ rūpamugraṃ tavedaṃ lokatrayaṃ pravyathitaṃ mahātman

word_info.hindi: हाथ जोड़े हुए (आपके नामों और गुणोंका)

word_info.english: bands of great Rishis and Siddhas

stanza.stanza: amī hi tvāṃ surasaṅghā viśanti kecidbhītāḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti
svastītyuktvā maharṣisiddhasaṅghāḥ stuvanti tvāṃ stutibhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ
rudrādityā vasavo ye ca sādhyā viśve'śvinau marutaścoṣmapāśca

word_info.hindi: गन्धर्व, यक्ष,असुर और सिद्धोंके समुदाय हैं,
word_info.english: hosts of Gandharvas,  Yakshas,  Asuras and Siddhas
with many arms,  thighs and feet

stanza.stanza: dṛṣṭvā hi tvāṃ pravyathitāntarātmā dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo

word_info.hindi: आप आकाशको स्पर्श कर रहे हैं  अर्थात् सब तरफसे  बहुत बड़े हैं,
आपके नेत्र प्रदीप्त और विशाल हैं।

foot.foot: dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo
diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma

stanza.stanza: daṃṣṭrākarālāni ca te mukhāni dṛṣṭvaiva kālānalasannibhāni
diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa
amī ca tvāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ sarve sahaivāvanipālasaṅghaiḥ

word_info.english: in the gaps between the teeth

stanza.stanza: vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni

word_info.english: heroes in the world of men

stanza.stanza: yathā pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ pataṅgā viśanti nāśāya samṛddhavegāḥ
tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokāstavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddhavegāḥ
ākhyāhi me ko bhavānugrarūpo namo'stu te devavara prasīda
vijñātumicchāmi bhavantamādyaṃ na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim
ṛte'pi tvāṃ na bhaviṣyanti sarve ye'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ
tasmāttvamuttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham
mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvameva nimittamātraṃ bhava savyasācin

word_info.hindi: हे सव्यसाचिन् अर्थात् दोनों हाथोंसे बाण चलानेवाले अर्जुन! (तुम इनको मारनेमें)

foot.foot: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca

stanza.stanza: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca karṇaṃ tathānyānapi yodhavīrān
mayā hatāṃstvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān
namaskṛtvā bhūya evāha kṛṣṇaṃ sagadgadaṃ bhītabhītaḥ praṇamya
sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā jagatprahṛṣyatyanurajyate ca
rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti sarve namasyanti ca siddhasaṅghāḥ

word_info.hindi: यह सब होना उचित ही है।
अनुराग-(प्रेम) को प्राप्त हो रहा है।
(आपके नाम, गुण आदिके कीर्तनसे) भयभीत होकर

word_info.english: the hosts of the perfected ones

stanza.stanza: kasmācca te na nameranmahātman garīyase brahmaṇo'pyādikartre
ananta deveśa jagannivāsa tvamakṣaraṃ sadasattatparaṃ yat

word_info.hindi: जो कुछ है, (वह भी आप ही हैं।)

foot.foot: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma

stanza.stanza: tvamādidevaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇastvamasya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam
vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma tvayā tataṃ viśvamanantarūpa
namo namaste'stu sahasrakṛtvaḥ punaśca bhūyo'pi namo namaste
manyase yadi tacchakyaṃ mayā draṣṭumiti prabho
namaḥ purastādatha pṛṣṭhataste namo'stu te sarvata eva sarva

foot.foot: he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti

stanza.stanza: sakheti matvā prasabhaṃ yaduktaṃ he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
ajānatā mahimānaṃ tavedaṃ mayā pramādātpraṇayena vāpi

word_info.english: while at play,  on bed,  while sitting or at meals

word_info.hindi: क्षमा करवाता हूँ  अर्थात् आपसे क्षमा माँगता हूँ।

stanza.stanza: pitāsi lokasya carācarasya tvamasya pūjyaśca gururgarīyān

word_info.hindi: (ऐसे ही) हे देव! (आप मेरे द्वारा किया गया अपमान)

stanza.stanza: piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum
adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hṛṣito'smi dṛṣṭvā bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me
tadeva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa

word_info.hindi: जिसको पहले कभी नहीं देखा, उस रूपको
अत्यन्त व्यथित हो रहा है। (अत: आप)

stanza.stanza: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastaṃ icchāmi tvāṃ draṣṭumahaṃ tathaiva
tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujena sahasrabāho bhava viśvamūrte

word_info.hindi: हाथमें चक्र लिये हुए अर्थात् चतुर्भुज-रूपसे
word_info.english: with a discus in the hand

stanza.stanza: mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitamātmayogāt
tejomayaṃ viśvamanantamādyaṃ yanme tvadanyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam
na vedayajñādhyayanairna dānairna ca kriyābhirna tapobhirugraiḥ
evaṃrūpaḥ śakya ahaṃ nṛloke draṣṭuṃ tvadanyena kurupravīra

word_info.english: by the study of the Vedas and of Yajnas
word_info.hindi: वेदोंके पाठसे, यज्ञोंके अनुष्ठानसे, शास्त्रोंके अध्ययनसे

word_info.english: O great hero of the Kurus

foot.foot: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvaḥ

stanza.stanza: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ ghoramīdṛṅmamedam
vyapetabhīḥ prītamanāḥ punastvaṃ tadeva me rūpamidaṃ prapaśya
paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo'tha sahasraśaḥ
ityarjunaṃ vāsudevastathoktvā svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayāmāsa bhūyaḥ
āśvāsayāmāsa ca bhītamenaṃ bhūtvā punaḥ saumyavapurmahātmā
dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana

word_info.hindi: इसके दर्शन  अत्यन्त ही दुर्लभ हैं।

stanza.stanza: nāhaṃ vedairna tapasā na dānena na cejyayā
śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavānasi māṃ yathā
jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca parantapa

word_info.english: O Parantapa (O scorcher of the foes)

stanza.stanza: nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa māmeti pāṇḍava

word_info.english: looks on Me as the Supreme

word_info.hindi: जिनको तूने पहले कभी देखा नहीं,

word_info.english: with the moving and the unmoving

stanza.stanza: na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭumanenaiva svacakṣuṣā
divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogamaiśvaram

word_info.hindi: इस प्रकार (ग्यारहवें अध्यायके पचपनवें श्लोकके अनुसार)

word_info.english: intent on doing actions for My sake
the renunciation of the fruits of all actions
the renunciation of the fruits of actions
word_info.hindi: सब कर्मोंके फलकी इच्छाका त्याग (श्रेष्ठ है);

stanza.stanza: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca

word_info.english: by (from) joy,  wrath,  fear and anxiety
word_info.hindi: हर्ष, अमर्ष (ईष्र्या), भय और उद्वेग-(हलचल-) से

foot.foot: mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ

stanza.stanza: harṣāmarṣabhayodvegairmukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ

word_info.hindi: सभी आरम्भोंका अर्थात् नये-नये कर्मोंके आरम्भका सर्वथा त्यागी है,

stanza.stanza: sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati

word_info.hindi: शुभ-अशुभ कर्मोंसे ऊँचा उठा हुआ (राग-द्वेषरहित) है,

stanza.stanza: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ

word_info.english: in cold and heat,  in pleasure and pain
word_info.hindi: शीत-उष्ण (शरीर-की अनुकूलता-प्रतिकूलता) तथा  सुख-दु:ख-(मन-बुद्धिकी अनुकूलता-प्रतिकूलता) में

word_info.english: to whom censure and praise are eal

word_info.hindi: रहनेके स्थान तथा शरीरमें ममता- आसक्तिसे रहित (और)

stanza.stanza: mayyāveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate
śraddhayā parayopetāḥ te me yuktatamā matāḥ

word_info.english: in the welfare of all beings
whose minds are set on the unmanifested

stanza.stanza: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparāḥ

word_info.english: regarding Me as the supreme goal
out of the ocean of the mortal Samsara
of those whose minds are set

stanza.stanza: mayyeva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya
nivasiṣyasi mayyeva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ

word_info.english: by the Yoga of constant practice

stanza.stanza: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram
prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñameva ca
etadyo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ

word_info.hindi: तत्त्वज्ञानके अर्थरूप परमात्माको सब जगह देखना
word_info.english: perception of the end of true knowledge

word_info.hindi: सम्पूर्ण इन्द्रियोंके विषयोंको प्रकाशित करनेवाले हैं;
word_info.english: shining by the functions of all senses

stanza.stanza: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktamiva ca sthitam
bhūtabhartṛ ca tajjñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca

word_info.english: that which is to be known

stanza.stanza: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam
iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ
kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata

word_info.english: of the field and of the knower of the field

word_info.hindi: कार्य और  करणके द्वारा होनेवाली  क्रियाओंको उत्पन्न  करनेमें
word_info.english: in the production of the effect,  and the cause
of birth in good and evil wombs

stanza.stanza: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha

word_info.english: regarding what they have heard as the Supreme refuge
from the union between the field and the knower of the field

stanza.stanza: na hinastyātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim
tatkṣetraṃ yacca yādṛkca yadvikāri yataśca yat
sa ca yo yatprabhāvaśca tatsamāsena me śṛṇu
tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma sampadyate tadā
śarīrastho'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate
kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata

word_info.english: between the Kshetra and the Kshetrajna
the liberation from the Prakriti of being

stanza.stanza: bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye viduryānti te param

word_info.english: in the suggestive words indicative of Brahman

stanza.stanza: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṅghātaścetanā dhṛtiḥ

word_info.english: perception of evil in painful conditions
in son,  wife,  home and the rest
on the attainment of the desirable and the undesirable

stanza.stanza: yajjñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhimito gatāḥ
rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaścaiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajastathā

word_info.english: O best of the Bharatas (or O Lord of the Bharatas)
of the knowers of the Highest

stanza.stanza: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti dehabhṛt

word_info.english: in the wombs of the senseless

stanza.stanza: sattvātsañjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca
ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ

word_info.english: abiding in the function of the lowest Guna

stanza.stanza: sarge'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca

word_info.english: out of which the body is evolved
from birth,  death,  decay and pain

stanza.stanza: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca mohameva ca pāṇḍava
na dveṣṭi sampravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati

word_info.hindi: स्थित रहता है (और स्वयं कोई भी)

word_info.english: regarding a clod of earth,  a stone and gold alike
word_info.hindi: जो मिट्टीके ढेले, पत्थर और सोनेमें सम रहता है;

word_info.english: the same to the dear and the undear

word_info.hindi: जो अपनी निन्दा-स्तुतिमें सम रहता है;
word_info.english: the same in censure and praise

word_info.hindi: जो सम्पूर्ण कर्मोंके आरम्भका  त्यागी है,

word_info.english: the source of thirst and attachment

word_info.hindi: (देहके साथ अपना सम्बन्ध माननेवालों-को) बाँधता है।

stanza.stanza: sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata

word_info.english: is the knower of the Vedas

stanza.stanza: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yastaṃ veda sa vedavit

word_info.english: those who possess the eye of knowledge

stanza.stanza: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam

word_info.hindi: जिन्होंने अपना अन्त:करण शुद्ध नहीं किया है, ( ऐसे )

word_info.hindi: जो भविष्यमें होंगे, (उन सब प्राणियोंको तो)

word_info.english: by the delusion of the pairs of opposites
freed from the delusion of the pairs of opposites

stanza.stanza: te brahma tadviduḥ kṛtsnamadhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam

word_info.hindi: वृद्धावस्था और मृत्युसे मुक्ति पानेके लिये
word_info.english: for liberation from old age and death
with the Adhibhuta and the Adhidaiva together

word_info.hindi: जानते हैं अर्थात् प्राप्त होते हैं।

stanza.stanza: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ
bhūmirāpo'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhireva ca

word_info.hindi: अपरा और परा— इन दोनों प्रकृतियोंका संयोग ही कारण है—
word_info.english: those of which these two (Prakritis) are the womb

stanza.stanza: mayi sarvamidaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva

word_info.english: in the moon and the sun

stanza.stanza: praṇavaḥ sarvavedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu
puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaścāsmi vibhāvasau
kiṃ tad brahma kimadhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama
prayāṇakāle manasā'calena bhaktyā yukto yogabalena caiva
bhruvormadhye prāṇamāveśya samyak sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam
yadakṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti viśanti yadyatayo vītarāgāḥ
yadicchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tatte padaṃ saṅgraheṇa pravakṣye
sarvadvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca
yaḥ prayāti tyajandehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim

word_info.english: with the mind not thinking of any other object

word_info.hindi: सुलभ हूँ अर्थात् उसको सुलभतासे प्राप्त हो जाता हूँ।

stanza.stanza: ananyacetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ

word_info.hindi: प्राप्त हो गये हैं अर्थात् उनको परम प्रेमकी प्राप्ति हो गयी है।

word_info.english: up to the world of Brahma

word_info.hindi: पुनरावर्तीवाले हैं अर्थात् वहाँ जानेपर पुन: लौटकर संसारमें आना पड़ता है;

stanza.stanza: māmupetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate

word_info.hindi: ब्रह्माके दिन और रातको जानने-वाले हैं।

word_info.english: in that which is called the Unmanifested

stanza.stanza: bhūtagrāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate
yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati
yaṃ prāpya na nivartante taddhāma paramaṃ mama
puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyastvananyayā
prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha

word_info.hindi: आवृत्तिको प्राप्त होते हैं अर्थात् पीछे लौटकर आते हैं,
प्राप्त होते हैं अर्थात् पीछे  लौटकर नहीं आते

stanza.stanza: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ

word_info.english: the northern path of the sun

word_info.hindi: पुरुष (पहले ब्रह्मलोकको प्राप्त होकर पीछे ब्रह्माके साथ)

word_info.english: the southern path of the sun

word_info.hindi: लौट आता है अर्थात् जन्म-मरणको प्राप्त होता है।

stanza.stanza: śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hyete jagataḥ śāśvate mate
naite sṛtī pārtha jānanyogī muhyati kaścana
vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapaḥsu caiva dāneṣu yatpuṇyaphalaṃ pradiṣṭam
atyeti tatsarvamidaṃ viditvā yogī paraṃ sthānamupaiti cādyam

word_info.english: that which causes the origin and growth of beings

stanza.stanza: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ
yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram

word_info.hindi: प्राप्त होता है अर्थात् उस-उस योनिमें ही चला जाता है।
वह उस (अन्तकालके) भावसे भावित होता हुआ

word_info.english: with mind and intellect fixed (or absorbed)
(with the mind made) steadfast by the method of habitual meditation
to one who does not cavil

word_info.hindi: सब ज्ञान व्यर्थ होते हैं अर्थात् उनकी आशाएँ, कर्म और

word_info.english: with a mind devoted to nothing else

word_info.hindi: चारों तरफ मुखवाले मेरे विराटरुपकी अर्थात् संसारको मेरा विराटरुप मानकर सेव्य सेवकभावसे

word_info.english: the offering to Pitris or ancestors
the medicinal herbs and all plants
the dispenser of the fruits of actions

stanza.stanza: gatirbhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇaṃ suhṛt

word_info.hindi: बरसा देता हूँ। (और तो क्या कहूँ)
बहुत सुगम है अर्थात् इसको प्राप्त करना बहुत सुगम है।

stanza.stanza: traividyā māṃ somapāḥ pūtapāpā yajñairiṣṭvā svargatiṃ prārthayante

word_info.english: the knowers of the three Vedas
word_info.hindi: तीनों वेदोंमें कहे  हुए सकाम अनुष्ठान-को करनेवाले (और)

word_info.english: the world of the Lord of gods

stanza.stanza: te taṃ bhuktvā svargalokaṃ viśālaṃ kṣīṇe puṇye martyalokaṃ viśanti

word_info.hindi: तीनों वेदोंमें कहे हुए सकाम धर्मका

word_info.english: the state of goind and returning

word_info.hindi: योगक्षेम (अप्राप्त- की प्राप्ति और प्राप्तकी रक्षा)
word_info.english: the supply of what is not already possessed,  and the preservation of what is already possessed

word_info.hindi: (पर करते हैं) अविधिपूर्वक अर्थात् देवताओंको मुझसे अलग मानते हैं।

stanza.stanza: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhureva ca
bhūtāni yānti bhūtejyā yānti madyājino'pi mām

word_info.hindi: जल आदि-(यथा-साध्य एवं अनायास प्राप्त वस्तु-) को
खा लेता हूँ अर्थात् स्वीकार कर  लेता हूँ।
तल्लीन हुए अन्त:- करणवाले भक्तके द्वारा

stanza.stanza: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati

word_info.hindi: शुभ (विहित) और अशुभ (निषिद्ध) सम्पूर्ण कर्मोंके फलोंसे
ऐसे अपनेसहित सब कुछ मेरे अर्पण  करनेवाला (और)
word_info.english: with the mind steadfast in the Yoga of renunciation

stanza.stanza: samo'haṃ sarvabhūteṣu na me dveṣyo'sti na priyaḥ
ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpyaham

word_info.hindi: लौटते रहते हैं अर्थात् बार-बार जन्मते-मरते रहते हैं।

word_info.english: in the path of this world of death

stanza.stanza: sādhureva sa mantavyaḥ samyagvyavasito hi saḥ
kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati
māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
striyo vaiśyāstathā śūdrāste'pi yānti parāṃ gatim

word_info.hindi: भगवान्के भक्त हों, (वे परमगतिको प्राप्त हो जायँ)

stanza.stanza: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru

word_info.english: taking Me as the Supreme Goal

stanza.stanza: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogamaiśvaram

word_info.english: at the end of the Kalpa
at the beginning of the Kalpa

stanza.stanza: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanañjaya
